About the Company: Uday Jewellery Industries Ltd carry on in India or elsewhere the business to manufacture, produce, design, develop, modify, build, encourage, refine, repair, process, prepare, fabricate, alter, dismantle, provide, exchange, remove, set, convert, finish, polish, cut, and to deal in all shapes, sizes, varieties, designs, combinations, and use of ornaments, and gems, in all kinds of jewellery, goods, watches, clocks, articles, and things, etc. They are located in the state of west Bengal.
